name: Roasted Cauliflower
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil or vegetable oil

instructions.en: Rinse the cauliflower and cut into serving-sized pieces
instructions.sk: Opláchnite karfiol a nakrájajte na kúsky veľkosti porcie
instructions.ja: カリフラワーを洗い、食べやすい大きさに切る

instructions.en: Place cauliflower pieces in a large zipper bag
instructions.sk: Vložte kúsky karfiolu do veľkého zipového vrecka
instructions.ja: カリフラワーの切り身を大きなジッパー付き袋に入れる

instructions.en: In a small bowl, mix oil, melted butter, salt, and pepper
instructions.sk: V malej miske zmiešajte olej, rozpustené maslo, soľ a korenie
instructions.ja: 小さなボウルに油、溶かしバター、塩、コショウを混ぜる

instructions.en: Pour oil mixture into the bag with cauliflower
instructions.sk: Nalejte olejovú zmes do vrecka s karfiolom
instructions.ja: 油混合物をカリフラワーの入った袋に注ぐ

instructions.en: Seal the bag and gently toss to coat cauliflower with oil mixture
instructions.sk: Uzavrite vrecko a jemne pretrepte, aby sa karfiol obalil olejovou zmesou
instructions.ja: 袋を密閉し、優しく振ってカリフラワーに油混合物をまぶす

instructions.en: Spread cauliflower in a single layer on a large rimmed baking sheet
instructions.sk: Rozložte karfiol v jednej vrstve na veľký plech s okrajmi
instructions.ja: 大きな縁付きベーキングシートにカリフラワーを一層に広げる
オーブンを400°F（200°C）に予熱する

instructions.en: Bake for 25-30 minutes, turning cauliflower every 10 minutes, until browned on edges and tender
instructions.sk: Pečte 25-30 minút, každých 10 minút karfiol otočte, kým nezhnedne na okrajoch a nezmäkne
instructions.ja: 25〜30分焼き、10分ごとにカリフラワーを返しながら、端が茶色くなり柔らかくなるまで調理する
